attributes.action: address the human rights issues of North Korea (DPRK) and their use of concentration camps to hold thousands of innocent men, women, and children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Human rights in North Korea are absolutely appalling, and it doesn't help that their government doesn't have any regard for the value of life. 
Please sign this petition so that the UK can lead the world into changing one of the most secretive and brutal states in the world.
